title: Why Everybody -Except Obama- Hates The Cadillac Tax
content: You may have heard that Congress is talking about delaying the "Cadillac Tax." And you may be wondering: What's the Cadillac Tax? Why is it so important? Why is it so unpopular? Give us two minutes and we'll answer your questions.
tags: may hates tax important everybody delaying heard unpopular talking wondering -except obama- congress cadillac
